name: SSDN Technologies
overview: SSDN Technologies Education is a leading ISO certified education and career services provider in Asia. SSDN Technologies is at the leading edge of IT services, solutions and education & training. We offer a comprehensive portfolio of IT specific technical training programs, soft skills trainings, integrated industry programs and technology solutions. SSDN Technologies welcomes those, who are willing to take on such challenges and transform themselves into proactive professionals. The institute supports their metamorphosis with innovative teaching-learning methodology, state-of-the-art computer labs and resources and overall professional development plans to become industry-ready IT professionals.

offices.address1: M44, Old- DLF Opo. Ganpati Honda
